nav.whatsappMessage: Hello TAFC, I would like to learn more about your seafood products.

hero.subtitle: between Tunisia and Algeria
hero.description: The Tunisian Algerian Fish Company partners with restaurants, hotels, caterers and specialty stores with a rigorous selection of fresh, traced and ready-to-cook fish and seafood.

about.description1: TAFC is a major player in fishing, processing and export of seafood in the Mediterranean. Our unique partnership between Tunisia and Algeria allows us to ensure a complete and diversified offer.
about.description2: We work with modern fleets and certified packaging centers to guarantee food safety, traceability and sustainability of our marine resources.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: To become an international reference in high-quality Mediterranean seafood products.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: To provide safe, traced products adapted to professional needs while respecting the marine environment.

whyTafc.title: Why TAFC?
whyTafc.description: Consistent quality, export volumes, flexibility and personalized B2B support.

bestSellers.title: Featured Best Sellers
bestSellers.description: Top-performing products trusted by our international clients and distribution partners.

categories.title: Structured ranges for your needs
categories.description: Our offer covers all seafood products: shrimp, squid, octopus, mollusks, Mediterranean fish, salmon, tuna, caviar and fish roe.

targetClients.description: Ultra-fresh products, sourced with precision for restaurants, hotels, chefs and professionals between Tunisia and Algeria.

catalog.title: A preview of our catalog
catalog.description: Discover some of our flagship references before exploring all products.

contact.title: Let's discuss your seafood needs
contact.description: Tell us what type of establishment you are, your volumes, your delivery frequencies... Our team will help you define your supply.

footer.tagline: Premium B2B seafood supplier. Quality, traceability and freshness guaranteed for demanding professionals.
footer.copyright: © {year} TAFC - Tunisian Algerian Fish Company. All rights reserved.

products.pageDescription: Discover our selection of premium seafood products

seo.title: TAFC - The Tunisian Algerian Fish Company | Premium B2B Seafood Products
seo.description: Premium B2B seafood supplier: Royal shrimp, octopus, squid, fresh and frozen Mediterranean fish. Certified exporter for HORECA professionals from Tunisia and Algeria.
seo.ogDescription: Your trusted partner for import-export of premium seafood from Tunisia and Algeria. Certified quality for professionals.
seo.twitterDescription: Export of fresh and frozen seafood products for the international market. Premium quality guaranteed.

hero.slogan: Mediterranean fish, a flavor without borders.

presentation.title: Presentation
presentation.text: The Tunisian Algerian Fish Company specializes in fishing, processing and marketing seafood products from the Mediterranean.

mission.title: Mission
mission.text: Provide fresh and frozen seafood sustainably, valuing the common marine resources between Tunisia and Algeria.

advantage.title: Competitive Advantage
advantage.text: An integrated company with a short and controlled production chain, guaranteeing freshness, traceability and quality control from the source.

values.title: Our Core Principles
values.subtitle: An uncompromising approach to quality, guided by respect for nature and our partners.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.subtitle: ABSOLUTE QUALITY
excellence.desc: From boat to plate, we guarantee total traceability and unmatched freshness.

cooperation.title: Cooperation
cooperation.subtitle: MUTUAL TRUST
cooperation.desc: Building solid bridges between nations and people for shared growth.

responsibility.title: Responsibility
responsibility.subtitle: NATURE COMMITMENT
responsibility.desc: Preserving the richness of the Mediterranean for future generations is our duty.

card.title: A Bridge Between Two Shores
card.description: We unite Tunisian know-how and Algerian richness to offer the best of the Mediterranean to the global market.

hero.title: Direct Contact
hero.subtitle: Immediate response for your urgent needs.

form.title: Or send a message
form.subtitle: We will process your email within 24h
form.name: NAME

crevettes-crustaces.name: Shrimp & Crustaceans
crevettes-crustaces.description: Premium quality white and red shrimp, prawns and crustaceans from the Mediterranean.

calamars-poulpes.name: Squid & Octopus
calamars-poulpes.description: Squid tubes, tentacles and whole octopus caught in the Mediterranean.

mollusques.name: Mollusks
mollusques.description: Fresh or frozen mussels, oysters, clams and shellfish from our coasts.

poissons-mediterranee.name: Mediterranean Fish
poissons-mediterranee.description: Sea bass, sea bream, whiting, sardines and noble fish from the Mediterranean.

saumon-thon.name: Salmon & Tuna
saumon-thon.description: Fillets, steaks and blocks of Atlantic salmon and export-quality tuna.

caviar-haute-gastronomie.name: Caviar & Fine Dining
caviar-haute-gastronomie.description: Exceptional caviar and luxury products for prestigious establishments.

oeufs-de-poisson-boutargue.name: Fish Roe & Bottarga
oeufs-de-poisson-boutargue.description: Fresh, frozen and dried fish roe (bottarga), for professionals and export.

merou-rouge.name: Red Grouper
merou-rouge.description: Wild Mediterranean red grouper (Hammour), with dense and refined flesh, ideal for signature dishes baked, grilled or slow-cooked.

merou-blanc.name: White Grouper
merou-blanc.description: Mediterranean white grouper, a noble fish with delicate and flavorful flesh, perfect for baking, grilling or in sauce.

pagre.name: Red Porgy
pagre.description: Fresh Mediterranean red porgy (Merjan), a fish with firm white flesh, highly prized for grilling and traditional Tunisian recipes.

dorade.name: Sea Bream
dorade.description: Whole Mediterranean sea bream, with a fine and elegant profile, ideal for baking, salt crust or whole grilling.

loup.name: Sea Bass
loup.description: Whole Mediterranean sea bass (bar), with fine and delicate flesh, perfect for en croûte, baked or grilled.

rouget-de-roche.name: Red Mullet
rouget-de-roche.description: Red mullet, a colorful fish with a pronounced iodized taste, highly sought after for gourmet dishes and Mediterranean recipes.

merlu.name: Hake
merlu.description: Mediterranean hake, with tender and light flesh, ideal for frying, steaming, in sauce or as brandade.

tilapia-du-nil.name: Nile Tilapia
tilapia-du-nil.description: Nile tilapia from controlled aquaculture, a fish with mild and neutral flesh, appreciated for frying, pan-frying and spiced preparations.

tilapia-rouge.name: Red Tilapia
tilapia-rouge.description: Red tilapia, a farmed fish with tender and soft flesh, ideal for whole frying, grilling and family dishes.

filets-de-tilapia.name: Tilapia Fillets
filets-de-tilapia.description: Boneless tilapia fillets, ready to cook, perfect for frying, breading, diet meals and fast food.

carpe.name: Carp
carpe.description: Freshwater carp, a traditional fish with firm flesh, suitable for stewed recipes, grilling and regional specialties.

filets-de-carpe.name: Carp Fillets
filets-de-carpe.description: Prepared and boneless carp fillets, practical for direct use in cooking, frying, sauce or baking.

sole.name: Sole
sole.description: Mediterranean sole, a flatfish with fine and delicate flesh, essential for gourmet menus.

mulet.name: Grey Mullet
mulet.description: Mediterranean grey mullet, a fish with flavorful flesh often used for grilling, tagines and bottarga preparation.

filets-de-saumon-avec-peau.name: Salmon Fillets (with skin)
filets-de-saumon-avec-peau.description: Atlantic salmon fillets with skin, rich in omega-3, perfect for grilling, baking or plancha.

filets-de-saumon-sans-peau.name: Salmon Fillets (skinless)
filets-de-saumon-sans-peau.description: Skinless salmon fillets, ready to portion or cook, suitable for restaurants, premium snacking and prepared meals.

tranches-de-saumon-fume.name: Smoked Salmon Slices
tranches-de-saumon-fume.description: Delicately smoked salmon slices, ready to be served on toast, catering platters or cold buffets.

encornet.name: Squid
encornet.description: Tender and flavorful squid (h'bar), ideal for frying, stuffing, sauces or plancha preparations.

poulpe.name: Octopus
poulpe.description: Mediterranean octopus, ideal for grilling, warm salads, tapas and long-simmered traditional dishes.

calamar-tube-100-300.name: Calamari
calamar-tube-100-300.description: Calibrated calamari tubes 100/300, perfectly cleaned, ready to be stuffed, cut into rings or pan-fried.

langouste.name: Spiny Lobster
langouste.description: Rock lobster, an exceptional crustacean for seafood platters, gourmet menus and high-end events.

crevette-blanche.name: White Shrimp
crevette-blanche.description: Versatile white shrimp, ideal for grilling, sautéing, sauce dishes, paellas or pasta garnishes.

chevrette.name: Caramote Prawn
chevrette.description: Local caramote prawn, with fine and sweet flavor, highly appreciated for frying, grilling and Mediterranean dishes.

crabe-bleu-decoupe.name: Blue Crab (Cut)
crabe-bleu-decoupe.description: Cut blue crab, with fragrant flesh, ideal for bisques, sauces, pasta, paellas and seafood buffets.

crevette-rouge.name: Red Shrimp
crevette-rouge.description: Deep-sea red shrimp, highly sought after for its vibrant color and fine flesh, perfect for signature dishes and refined presentations.

mixte-fruits-de-mer.name: Mixed Seafood
mixte-fruits-de-mer.description: Ready-to-use seafood mix, ideal for paellas, risottos, pizzas, pasta and wok dishes.

caviar-beluga.name: Beluga Caviar
caviar-beluga.description: Beluga caviar, large and melting pearls, an exceptional product for gourmet tables, VIP receptions and food and champagne pairings.

caviar-impérial.name: Imperial Caviar
caviar-impérial.description: Imperial caviar, balanced and aromatic grains, ideal for room service, premium platters and refined tastings.

caviar-osetra.name: Osetra Caviar
caviar-osetra.description: Osetra caviar, golden to amber grains, with hazelnut notes, perfect for gourmet menus and food and vodka pairings.

boutargue-poudre.name: Bottarga Powder
boutargue-poudre.description: Finely ground mullet bottarga, made from dried and aged roe sacs. An exceptional condiment with an intense marine flavor, ideal for enhancing pasta, risottos, eggs, salads, and gourmet creations.

boutargue-congelee.name: Frozen Bottarga
boutargue-congelee.description: Frozen bottarga, ideal for long-term storage while preserving quality, texture and aromatic potential.

boutargue-sechee.name: Dried Bottarga
boutargue-sechee.description: Traditional dried bottarga, aged for an intense and salty flavor, perfect grated on pasta, risottos or served in thin slices.

boutargue-calmar.name: Squid Bottarga
boutargue-calmar.description: Dried squid bottarga, delicately salted and aged to offer a melting texture and intense marine flavor. Perfect grated over pasta, risottos, eggs or enjoyed in thin slices.

crevette-blanche-sans-tete.name: White Shrimp (Headless)
crevette-blanche-sans-tete.description: Headless prepared white shrimp, practical and regular, ideal for wok, sautéing, stewed dishes, buffets and fast food.

ui.heroDescription: Our mission is to provide sustainable and highest quality seafood. That's why our entire selection comes from fishermen who, like us, are committed to responsible consumption and ocean protection.
ui.searchNoResultsDesc: We couldn't find products matching your criteria.
